cause.description:
Working together, giving each other suggestions, learning from one another, and using our handy Zombie Survival Guides, we can prepare for any possible outbreaks we might encounter. Now, you may say there are no Zombie threats left, but if you think about it, they can survive underwater. so whos to say they arent walking around below the ocean surface, wandering, and eventually ending up back on land to start another outbreak.
1. It -CAN- happen.
2. It -WILL- happen.
3. We -CAN- survive.
cause.mission: Prepare humanity for the possibility of Zombie outbreaks
cause.name: Zombie Survival and Awareness
